landingSection.title: You're a Great Coach. Now You Can Be Great at Getting Clients
landingSection.description: Download the 3 Proven Marketing Plans Used Most by Successful Health Coaches and take your marketing game up a notch.

brandsSection.title: Trusted by coaches certified by leading institutions

whatIsFlowellSection.title: What is Flowell?
whatIsFlowellSection.description: Flowell helps health, fitness, nutrition, and wellness coaches get clients and run their business on its easy-to-use platform. We provide marketing plans and guidance so that every health coach can make an impact and find the freedom they dream of.

bannerDetails.title: Health Coach Business Building System
bannerDetails.description: Start your comprehensive, step-by-step, self-paced health coach business success plan with personalized marketing strategy to get new clients faster, without the headache.

coachingToolKitSection.title: Turn-key Online Coaching Toolkit
coachingToolKitSection.description: Focus on coaching, not on technology. We build your web pages, streamline payments, and help you nurture and monetize your community.

communitiySection.title: Professional Health and Wellness Community
communitiySection.description: Never feel alone again with our community of like-minded coaches. Make friends, collaborate and build partnerships to get more clients and serve them better.

whatYouGetSection.title: What Will You Get?
whatYouGetSection.description: The best coaches in the world have the best tools and guidance, and now so do you. Join Flowell today to unlock everything you need to market yourself and get new clients, fast.

benefits.title: Business Growth
benefits.caption: Receive a personalized marketing plan and hundreds of resources to increase sales and boost your profits

benefits.title: Streamlined Technology
benefits.caption: Use our tools and platform to easily collect payments, nurture leads, and engage with clients

benefits.title: Coaching and Community
benefits.caption: Get the guidance and support you need from experts who have been in your shoes

testimonialSection.title: Flowell Coaches Are Crushing It!
testimonialSection.description: Coaches who were struggling with marketing are using their personalized Flowell marketing plans to go from $0 to $5k per month in less than 6 months. Hear their stories!
